0.name: Professor Infestation
text: Plz kill, I hav gift en return.

1.name: Lost Syllabus
1.description: Find the lost syllabus for Mister Baptise.
text: I need  favor, but this is the last time.
I lost my syllabus, could you please find it?
I will fail my exam if you don't.

2.name: Too much Blues
text: I can't relax because of those darn crabs.
See, I know they respawn and stuff.
But can you kill forty of them?
